RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 12. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KITTEN'S MAN was allowed to settle early, came into the lane four wide and angled out to the outside and closed well late to get up in time to prove best under a drive. SAN ANTONE stalked the early pace four wide, came five wide into the lane and closed well to gain a short lead late but was outfinished by the winner. HESASMOKIN tracked the early pace, then was in contention on the turn and was blocked nearing the quarter pole, remained blocked to leaving the furlong marker and then split rivals nearing the sixteenth marker and finished well but needed more. BERHANU vied for the early lead, then made a bid between rivals by the quarter pole, then gained a short lead leaving the furlong marker but faded late. COAST TO COAST was off a beat slow, then advanced on the inside and was ridden along on the turn, swung out four wide leaving the turn and then was in tight between rivals by the furlong marker and ran on but had no kick. HAIR OF THE DOG vied for the lead on the inside and weakened the final furlong. HERE WEGO pressed the pace and made a three wide bid on the turn to vie for command by the quarter pole, then was bumped nearing the sixteenth marker and was empty late. GEM JUAN showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Hair of the Dog
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, weakened 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Coast to Coast
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside, ridden along turn, swung 4 wide, in tight 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Hesasmokin
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, blocked 1/4-1/8, split 1/16, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Berhanu
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2 wide, bid between 1/4, led 1/8, late fade

ENTRY.NAME: Here Wego
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, bumped 1/16, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: San Antone
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, came 5 wide, closed, led late, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Kitten's Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, angled out, closed outside, up in time,driving

ENTRY.NAME: Gem Juan
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 15400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 12 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 12 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIGH HEAT stalked the early pace and made a three wide bid on the turn, hit the front at the furlong marker and slowly edged away from the pacesetter and then held on late to prove best, driving. U U STAR was rated along the inside early, eased off the inside on the turn and came four wide into the lane, finished well to be gaining late to just miss. SUTTON VALLEY set a pressed pace early three wide, then shook clear on the turn and dropped to the inside, then was headed leaving the turn and faded late, bested rest. THE LITTLE SPROUT was settled early on the inside, advanced on the turn and cut the corner but finished evenly late. SUIT OF ARMOR was bumped hard at the start, advanced on the inside and then shifted to the outside on the turn and came up empty in the drive. SASSY LAD failed to menace. LAST MINUTE MARIO pressed the pace on the inside and weakened. WHAT'S MY CATEGORY was not a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: U U Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, eased off inside turn, came 4 wide, gaining, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Last Minute Mario
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: The Little Sprout
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside turn, cut corner, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: High Heat
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, held late, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Suit of Armor
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped hard start, inside 1/2, 4 wide 1/4. empty,

ENTRY.NAME: What's My Category
ENTRY.OWNER: Cramer David and Triple B Stables LLC (Ryter)
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Lad
ENTRY.OWNER: W M T Stable and Sylmar Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Sutton Valley
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace 3 wide, drew clear turn inside, faded late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 11800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 12 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since November 12 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHEMADEMELUCKY was allowed to settle early and made a inside move on the turn to vie for command by the quarter pole, shook clear leaving the turn and remained clear to prove best, driving. LAUGH IT OFF lost iron at the start, was able to get the boot back in on the first turn, then was rated along, swung out five wide leaving the turn and finished well to gain the place award. DANCE A LITTLE JIG was reserved early, made a inside move on the turn and continued on in the lane but needed more while just missing the place award. BLU SKY SUNRISE stalked the early pace and made a four wide bid on the turn but flattened out in the drive, missed show spot. YOURINDENIAL set the pace while racing off the inside, then was headed by the quarter pole and weakened. SCHOOL OF THOUGHT chased the pace three to four wide and tired. SMOKIN CLASS chased the pace on the inside and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Smokin Class
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Laugh It Off
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost iron start, rated early, swung 5 wide, rallied, got 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Yourindenial
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, off rail, headed 1/4, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Dance a Little Jig
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, inside move, missed place

ENTRY.NAME: Shemademelucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, bid inside, drew clear upper, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: School of Thought
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3-4 wide, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Blu Sky Sunrise
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3-4 wide, bid 4 wide, flattened out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RENEWING VOWS was reserved early while saving ground, angled out nearing the quarter pole for racing room, came wide and closed full of run to get up and edge clear to prove best under strong left handed crop urging. MOBEER set the pace while racing in the two path, was well handled on the turn and shook clear leaving the turn was clear by the furlong marker but was caught in deep stretch, good effort. ON AN ISLAND was well placed on the inside to the three sixteenth and angled out for aim on the front runner but flattened out the final furlong, held show award. UPFOR PAROLE was rated along on the inside, then eased out and was two wide by the quarter pole, then shifted back in for racing room in the lane but had no late kick. TEMPO CRESCENDO stalked the pace and made a three wide bid on the turn and weakened. BEJUCO was rated along three to four wide, made a four wide bid on the turn and weakened. BOOK RUNNER lacked a rally. OUT OF STOCK stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Upfor Parole
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, 2 wide 1/4 pole, angled in 3/16, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Renewing Vows
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, angled out 1/4, came wide, closed, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Out of Stock
ENTRY.COMMENT: stopped

ENTRY.NAME: On an Island
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, angled out 3/16, flattened out, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Book Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Tempo Crescendo
ENTRY.OWNER: Richards Helen Maroscia Diane Searles Peter Davis Barbara J and Fallon Mary
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Bejuco
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 3-4 wide, bid 4 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Mobeer
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 2 wide, well handled, shook clear 1/8, caught late,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 14400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOWSER was slammed at the start, settled into stride near the back, advanced two wide on the turn, angled out leaving the turn while advancing, then angled back in leaving the furlong marker and closed full of run up the inside to edge away late, driving. PLATINUM PROMISE set the pace on the inside while being well handled, then drew clear nearing the furlong marker and off the inside, but was caught late, second best. VAN HAVEN stalked the pace and made a three wide bid nearing the quarter pole but hung in the lane. QUEEN CADENCE was settled early and three wide on the turn, came five wide into the lane and had a late rally. MIZ THE BEST stumbled badly at the start, then was three wide by the quarter pole, shifted to the inside and had a belated rally on the inside. SAKARI lacked a serious rally. DON'T TALK was settled early on the inside, then shifted out on the turn and was five wide by the quarter pole and weakened. SHOYYOOKH chased the pace three wide and weakened. BO RUNKLE was reserved three to four wide and tired. MASKED HEROINE was well placed early on the inside and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Platinum Promise
ENTRY.OWNER: Wasabi Ventures Stables LLC Rocky Top Stables and Sedmak Stephen
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, drew clear 1/8, caught late, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Masked Heroine
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Talk
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, 5 wide 1/4 pole, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Sakari
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Dowser
ENTRY.COMMENT: slammed start, angled out upper, angled in 1/8, closed, up inside

ENTRY.NAME: Bo Runkle
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved 3-4 wide, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Shoyyookh
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Van Haven
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, hung stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Miz the Best
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled badly start, far back, belatedly inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Queen Cadence
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3 wide turn, came 5 wide, late rally,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A PA-RESTRICTED RACE(S) OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 12 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 12 Allo wed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ECLIPTICALS SARAH set a pressured pace on the inside, then came off the inside by the quarter pole and made a bid leaving the turn and drew clear, then widened the margin to prove much the best. PHANCY PHILLY was bumped at the start, settled on the inside, swung out four wide leaving the turn and rallied well for the place award. TOOTSYSROCKNROLLER was void of early speed, angled out in the drive and had a belated rally. DWELLER stalked the pace and made a four wide bid on the turn but came up empty in the lane. COSMOLOGICAL pressed the early pace in between rivals and weakened. NO EASY ANSWER pressed the pace three wide and was between rivals by the quarter pole and weakened. ALWAYS MIA was allowed to settle, made a four wide move on the turn and then was empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Eclipticals Sarah
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, off rail 1/4, drew out stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Tootsysrocknroller
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, angled out stretch, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Phancy Philly
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, settled inside, swung 4 wide, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Always Mia
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4 wide 1/4 pole, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Cosmological
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace between, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: No Easy Answer
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, between 1/4, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Dweller
ENTRY.OWNER: Warriors Reward LLC and Premier Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, bid 4 wide, empty stretch,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 10000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 12. Weight, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BAVARIA vied for the early lead three wide, then went on to set the pace down the backstretch, drew off leaving the turn and was kept to mild pressure to prove much the best. WEEKEND IN COURT was void of early speed, came five wide into the lane and finished well to gain the place award. VISHNU tracked the pace two to three wide and weakened, bested rest. PIGGYBANK was reluctant to load, settled three to four wide and lacked a rally. DIGGERS DIAMOND settled early on the inside and tired. SMOOTH OPERATION vied for the lead on the inside and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Diggers Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Vishnu
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, 2-3 wide, weakened, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth Operation
ENTRY.OWNER: Cramer David and Triple B Stables LLC (Ryter)
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Weekend in Court
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, came 5 wide upper stretch, rallied for place

ENTRY.NAME: Bavaria
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3 wide, set pace backstretch, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Piggybank
ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant to load, settled 4 wide, 3 wide turn, no rally,
